### Input:
```untitled
  - reply to as many bugs as you can
<|editable_region_start|>
    - goal: make sure people have a reply
  - close out dupes/gtfos/niche/too-hards/vague
  - move to discussions
    - editor parity requests -> "Zed Ideas from Other Editors" sections
    - worth considering -> " 

Actions for remaining Issues: 
- Set Type: [Crash, Bug, Feature, Meta]
- Edit title
- Edit description:
  - Remove header;
  - Add one sentence top: "Summary: blah!"
  - Replace screenshots/videos with text
  - Bugs: Refine/Simplify reproduction steps
- Comment with response (see templates)
- [Optional] Self assign if you want to fix
- [Optional] Add to Projects:
  - Closers Project:            https://github.com/orgs/zed-industries/projects/23
  - PaperCuts 2025:             https://github.com/orgs/zed-industries/projects/24
  - Quality Week Winter 2025:   https://github.com/orgs/zed-industries/projects/27

Initial Response Templates:

* Lead with something human (thanks, sorry, uhoh, ...), and then provide an actionable next step (more info needed, we'll fix, let's move to discussion)

- Bugs / crashes:
  - Thanks for reporting - that shouldn't happen. I can reproduce the problem, and we'll think about how to fix this.
  - Sorry about this! I can't easily reproduce the problem. Does this happen on all projects, or just some? Is there anything relevant in the Zed logs?
    tag:"awaiting info" so we can close if they don't reply in a month or so
  - That doesn't sound good... Can you please clarify the steps you took to make this happen?
    tag:"awaiting info" so we can close if they don't reply in a month or so
  - Looks like a recent regression, cc @victim - could you please take a look?
  - Makes sense. We're working on Windows/Git/AI/etc. and will look into this as part of that (<|user_cursor_is_here|>tag:"windows"
  
- Enhancements:
  - Thanks for the idea! This is likely something we should talk through in the discussions. 
  - Nice, a few people have requested something like this. We're tracking all the things we could pull from [Sublime] in a discussion,
    (list of possible discussions, inlcuding editor specific ones: https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/discussions)
  - This would be great! That said, I think we should hold off until we have better extension support and build it as an extension.

- Support requests:
  - Ugh, this is confusing. Key context matching happens per node (see https://zed.dev/docs/key-bindings); and unfortunately we can't easily express `!Terminal` because `Workspace` matches `!Terminal`. We'll continue to think about it.


## Work Segregation

- Refresh your search results pages often (avoid duplicating work)

### Issue search modifiers:

```
no:type
is:issue is:open 
comments:0
created:>2023-12-01 created:<2024-01-01 
author:@me
commenter:@me
involves:@me
reactions:>10 
interactions:>50  
label:bug
label:enhancement
```

### Labels:
<|editable_region_end|>
```

### Response

    tag:"awaiting info" so we can close if they don't reply in a month or so
